Text: Thank you! When i updated to 1.7 I was pissed that it came back, but thanks! No more annoying text!

So I just have to drag this into my minecraft folder?
............No? You drag it into your minecraft.jar using winrar. Did you even read the instructions?!?

This actually works quite well (^_^)

It is important that you don't use winrar,winzip,7zip etc etc to actually EXTRACT the minecraft.jar file. Just use them to OPEN it. From that window you can delete the "META-INF" folder. Then just copy the Vu.class file to the open window. Works perfect thanks so much !
Cool! Now I can post videos on youtube without being blamed that I'm a pirate! Thank you!
